title: Alien ‘corpses’, RAF cover-ups & royal nuclear bunkers... inside eerie top-secret UFO research base dubbed ‘UK’s Area 51’
description: AN abandoned RAF site dubbed Britain’s ‘Area 51’ is a magnet for UFO hunters, urban explorers and conspiracy theorists who believe it was once home to government investigations into aliens. From the outside, Rudloe Manor in Wiltshire looks like your typical 17th century Grade II listed house set in quiet rural surroundings. But in 1950 it...
